descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Brandon Williams puts a few moves on his defender and knocks down the and-1 for the Trail Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brandon Williams fights off defender for and-1) 2022/03/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brandon Williams drives and drains the smooth and-1

videos.description: Justise Winslow takes flight and denies the Pistons at the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Justise Winslow with the massive swat at the rim) 2022/03/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Justise Winslow with the massive swat at the rim

videos.description: Saben Lee fires a dart to Luka Garza for the and-1 to pull the Pistons closer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Garza bulldozes through his defender for the and-1) 2022/03/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka Garza bulldozes through his defender for the and-1

videos.description: Jamorko Pickett elevates and throws down the lob from Cade Cunningham.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham lobs a beauty to Jamorko Pickett for the flush) 2022/03/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham lobs a beauty to Jamorko Pickett for the flush

videos.description: Cade Cunningham drives past the Trail Blazers defense and rocks the rim for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham drives to the rack and throws down the hammer) 2022/03/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham drives to the rack and throws down the hammer

videos.description: Cade Cunningham is smooth as silk as he drains back-to-back buckets for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham knocks down back-to-back baskets) 2022/03/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham knocks down back-to-back baskets
